roleset.name: make into a code, encrypt
roleset.note: ENCODE-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from encode.01-v)

example.name: With Purpose
example.text: Meanwhile, cable channels must encode adult programs to prevent children from being able to watch them at will.
example.arg: to prevent children from being able to watchthem at will

roleset.name: be encoded for a certain function, as with genes
roleset.note: CODE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts, comparison to code.04.

example.name: code-v
example.text: IFN-y, a cytokine, induces the gene's encoding for this T cell chemoattractant.
